title: [Hall of the Marred]
description: Part of the north wall has succumbed to the spreading roots of vegetation growing along its outer surface, allowing a glimpse of starry sky and the courtyard beyond.  The mural's colors are still visible in the flickering candlelight even where the elements have spoiled some of its detail.
